ACTIVATED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local token_count = 1 if token_count > 0 then MTG():PutTokensIntoPlay( "_TOKEN_C_624999", token_count, EffectController() ) end

ACTIVATED_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: {1}: Inkmoth Nexus becomes a 1/1 Blinkmoth artifact creature with flying and infect until end of turn. It's still a land. (It deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)

ACTIVATED_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: if Object() ~= nil then Object():GetCurrentCharacteristics():CardType_GetWritable(Object()):Add( CARD_TYPE_ARTIFACT, Object() ) end
if Object() ~= nil then Object():GetCurrentCharacteristics():CardType_GetWritable(Object()):Add( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE, Object() ) end
if Object() ~= nil then local characteristics = Object():GetCurrentCharacteristics() characteristics:Power_Set( 1 ) characteristics:Toughness_Set( 1 ) end
if Object() ~= nil then local characteristics = Object():GetCurrentCharacteristics() characteristics:Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_FLYING, 1 ) end
if Object() ~= nil then local characteristics = Object():GetCurrentCharacteristics() characteristics:Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_INFECT, 1 ) end
if Object() ~= nil then Object():GetCurrentCharacteristics():SubType_GetWritable(Object()):Add( CREATURE_TYPE_BLINKMOTH , Object() ) end
